text:
Need for a new foreach controller, wjich will step through a list of values

give it some input variable, which consists of several variables each extended 
with a number, eg input vaibale searchlink, you need to have defined 
searchlink_1, searchlink_2 etc, it will se these values successive and place 
them in the output variable.
creator: dolfsmits@zonnet.nl
dolfsmits@zonnet.nl

gui control panel for ForEach controller
creator: dolfsmits@zonnet.nl
dolfsmits@zonnet.nl
text:
I made the patch from the level core.org.apache.jmeter.control, so the 
following keys need to be added to the messages.properties as well.
foreach_controller_title=ForEach Controller

foreach_input=Name of input variable

foreach_return=Name of return variable

Added as a BETA version for now.

Some issues to resolve:
- if the variable does not exist, it still invokes any nested samplers. 
 Is this useful behaviour, or should it skip the samplers? Or fail the test?
 If it should invoke the samplers, what should the output variable be set to?
- component reference docn needed
creator: sebb@apache.org
dolfsmits@zonnet.nl
